pullRequest.title: Support non-hive types in hive views
pullRequest.bodyText:
Test plan - unit test
== RELEASE NOTES ==


Hive Changes
* Add support for non-hive types to hive views.  This support had been removed in 0.233.  If a view uses an unsupported type for any columns ,we will store only a single dummy column for that view in the metastore.

nodes.bodyText: we should add a comment explaining why we have the dummy instead of proper column metadata. In my opinion, the message should be very clear - Using dummy since column "abc" has an unsupported Hive type "xyz" to avoid getting questions around why is my column metadata missing.

commit.message:
Suport non-hive types for Hive views

When a non-hive type is used for any column in a hive view, include only
a single dummy column in the metastore.
